mn23:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn23:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma kumarakassapo andhavane viharati.
mn23:1.4: Atha kho annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam andhavanam obhasetva yenayasma kumarakassapo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho sa devata ayasmantam kumarakassapam etadavoca:
mn23:2.1: “Bhikkhu bhikkhu, ayam vammiko rattim dhumayati, diva pajjalati.
mn23:2.4: Abhikkhananto sumedho sattham adaya addasa langim
mn23:2.9: Abhikkhananto sumedho sattham adaya addasa uddhumayikam.
mn23:2.14: Abhikkhananto sumedho sattham adaya addasa dvidhapatham.
mn23:2.19: Abhikkhananto sumedho sattham adaya addasa cangavaram.
mn23:2.24: Abhikkhananto sumedho sattham adaya addasa kummam.
mn23:2.29: Abhikkhananto sumedho sattham adaya addasa asisunam.
mn23:2.34: Abhikkhananto sumedho sattham adaya addasa mamsapesim.
mn23:2.39: Abhikkhananto sumedho sattham adaya addasa nagam.
mn23:2.42: ‘titthatu nago, ma nagam ghattesi; namo karohi nagassa’ti.
mn23:2.43: Ime kho tvam, bhikkhu, panhe bhagavantam upasankamitva puccheyyasi, yatha ca te bhagava byakaroti tatha nam dhareyyasi.
mn23:2.44: Naham tam, bhikkhu, passami sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya, yo imesam panhanam veyyakaranena cittam aradheyya annatra tathagatena va, tathagatasavakena va, ito va pana sutva”ti—
mn23:3.1: Atha kho ayasma kumarakassapo tassa rattiya accayena yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma kumarakassapo bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn23:3.2: “imam, bhante, rattim annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam andhavanam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho, bhante, sa devata mam etadavoca:
mn23:3.3: ‘bhikkhu bhikkhu, ayam vammiko rattim dhumayati, diva pajjalati.
mn23:3.10: Ko nu kho, bhante, vammiko, ka rattim dhumayana, ka diva pajjalana, ko brahmano, ko sumedho, kim sattham, kim abhikkhanam, ka langi, ka uddhumayika, ko dvidhapatho, kim cangavaram, ko kummo, ka asisuna, ka mamsapesi, ko nago”ti?
mn23:4.1: “‘Vammiko’ti kho, bhikkhu, imassetam catumahabhutikassa kayassa adhivacanam, matapettikasambhavassa odanakummasupacayassa aniccucchadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhamsanadhammassa.
mn23:4.2: Yam kho, bhikkhu, diva kammante arabbha rattim anuvitakketi anuvicareti—
mn23:4.4: Yam kho, bhikkhu, rattim anuvitakketva anuvicaretva diva kammante payojeti kayena vacaya manasa—
mn23:4.6: ‘Brahmano’ti kho, bhikkhu, tathagatassetam adhivacanam arahato sammasambuddhassa.
mn23:4.12: abhikkhana, sumedha, sattham adayati ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.15: abhikkhana, sumedha, sattham adayati ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.18: abhikkhana, sumedha, sattham adayati ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.19: ‘Cangavaran’ti kho, bhikkhu, pancannetam nivarananam adhivacanam, seyyathidam—
mn23:4.22: abhikkhana, sumedha, sattham adayati ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.23: ‘Kummo’ti kho, bhikkhu, pancannetam upadanakkhandhanam adhivacanam, seyyathidam—
mn23:4.26: abhikkhana, sumedha, sattham adayati ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.28: cakkhuvinneyyanam rupanam itthanam kantanam manapanam piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam,
mn23:4.32: kayavinneyyanam photthabbanam itthanam kantanam manapanam piyarupanam kamupasamhitanam rajaniyanam.
mn23:4.34: abhikkhana, sumedha, sattham adayati ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.37: abhikkhana, sumedha, sattham adayati ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.39: Titthatu nago, ma nagam ghattesi; namo karohi nagassati ayametassa attho”ti.
mn23:4.41: Attamano ayasma kumarakassapo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
